item.description:
Grab those Flip Flops, the Sunglasses and the Don that Hawaiian Shirt....Its BEACH BLAST Time!!!!!

 

DKJ Foundation is holding an annual fundraiser to raise money for the awareness of Alzheimers Disease and other progressive aging diseases.  To learn more about the foundation please check out their webiste:  http://dkjfoundation.org

 

This event will raise money for the foundation, but also be an awesome night with Dancing to the great sound of DCMS. 

 

Price:  $20.00 pp or $200 per table.  Anyone who would like to prepay for this event please contact Janet.  If enough tickets are sold prior to the event we will be able to reserve tables.

Dress Code:  Beach Attire is requested

Refreshments:  Lite fare & slush

So come on out and have a "hot" night on the beach with us.

 

Hope to see you all there

Donna & Janet
item.name: DKJ Foundation BEACH BLAST with Don't Call Me Shirley
